snippet: The conviction of a crusading Spanish judge for overstepping his powers in an anti-corruption case has stirred unease among human rights campaigners and legal experts who fear it is just the latest example of politicians interfering with the wheels...
abstract: The conviction of a crusading Spanish judge for overstepping his powers in an anti-corruption case has stirred unease among human rights campaigners and legal experts who fear it is just the latest example of politicians interfering with the wheels of justice.

headline.main: Campaigners Oppose Trend to Put Politics Above the Law
